ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( RecordType.Name = 'UAE',OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'KYC Completed'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'KYC Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Approved'))),IF(ISPICKVAL(AML_Type__c, 'Corporate'), OR( ISBLANK(Customer_s_Country_of_Registration__c ), ISBLANK(Beneficial_Owner_Country_of_Citizenship__c ), ISBLANK(Industry__c ), ISBLANK(Year_of_Establishment__c ), ISBLANK(Financial_Information_Documents__c ), ISBLANK(Mode_of_Payment__c ), ISBLANK(Screening_Shareholder__c ), ISBLANK(Other_businesses_of_the_client__c )) ,false),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When the AML type is "Corporate" or "Trust" and the status is either "approved," "KYC completed," or "KYC approved," it is mandatory to provide all Corporate parameters.
